titles.title: To release the reversionary interest of the United States in certain non-Federal land in Salt Lake City, Utah, and for other purposes.
To release the reversionary interest of the United States in certain non-Federal land in Salt Lake City, Utah, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

bill.summary: This bill releases to the University of Utah, without consideration, the reversionary interest of the United States in approximately 593 acres of specified nonfederal land.
